description:
Optimized for kayak touring, the Hydrus Tempest uses 2.5-layer waterproof fabric that's lightweight, breathable and supple. Pull on the storm hood during a downpour and batten down the wrist gaskets to stay protected. The double tunnel design with drawcord closure provides a splash-proof interface with your sprayskirt.

  • Hydrus 2.5-layer waterproof-breathable fabric is highly packable
  • Pullover design reduces bulk for great packability
  • Multi-adjustable storm hood with brim stands up to rain from any direction
  • Neoprene cinch collar is comfortable and highly water resistant
  • Wrists are latex gaskets with adjustable hook-and-loop closures
  • Double tunnel with drawcord closure creates a splash proof interface with sprayskirt tunnels
  • Flap pocket on upper left sleeve
  • Reflective detailing on hood and forearms
name: Kokatat Hydrus Tempest Jacket - Unisex
